gacha_info.gacha_detail:
Normal Gacha


• The Normal Gacha costs nothing to draw.
• You can perform a 10-draw up to twice a day.
• Available draws reset at 1:00 p.m. and 8:00 p.m. (UTC).
• Rewards include items and Memory Shards.
gacha_info.gacha_notice:
Important Notes

• The availability period of the Normal Gacha may be changed without warning.
• Items and Memory Shards obtained from the Normal Gacha may include duplicates.
• The draw rates of items and Memory Shards in the Normal Gacha differ per individual reward.
• Depending on your network connection, the gacha animation may be skipped or only partially displayed. Even in these cases, the correct items and/or Memory Shards will be added to your inventory. Please check the Item List and Memory Shard List to confirm.
• Available free daily gacha draws are reset each day at 1:00 p.m. and 8:00 p.m. (UTC).

•You can perform a 10-draw up to twice a day.
• Available draws reset at 1:00 p.m. and 8:00 p.m. (UTC).
• Rewards include items and Memory Shards.
gacha_info.gacha_notice:
Important Notes

• The availability period of the Normal Gacha may be changed without warning.
• Items and Memory Shards obtained from the Normal Gacha may include duplicates.
• The draw rates of items and Memory Shards in the Normal Gacha differ per individual reward.
• In certain network connection environments, the gacha animation may be skipped or only partially displayed. Even in these cases, the correct items and/or Memory Shards will be added to your inventory. Please check the Item List and Memory Shard List to confirm.
• Available free daily gacha draws are reset each day at 1:00 p.m. and 8:00 p.m. (UTC).

gacha_info.gacha_detail:
About This Gacha

This gacha can be drawn by consuming paid Jewels, free Jewels or applicable tickets.
Rewards consist of characters with rarity 1★ or above.
When using the "Draw 10" option, the tenth reward is guaranteed to have rarity of 2★ or above.
Characters with rarity 3★ or above have a unique illustration that can be displayed on your home screen.
Any characters who have already joined your party will be automatically converted into Divine Amulets.
Note: Divine Amulets received in this way are not sent to the Present Box; they will be directly added to your current total.
Note: Any Divine Amulets that exceed the maximum will be sent to your Present Box.
The Present Box can be found on the Home screen via the Presents icon.
(The number of Divine Amulets received for a duplicate character depends on that character's rarity. For details, see Draw Rates.)
gacha_info.gacha_notice:
Important Notes

• The contents of the Premium Gacha may be changed without warning.
• The chance of any given character appearing from the Premium Gacha differs based on that character's assigned rate.
• Characters who have already joined your party may still appear as Premium Gacha rewards, but it is not possible to possess more than one of a single character.
• Duplicate character rewards will be converted into Divine Amulets.
• Divine Amulets received in this way are not sent to the Present Box; they will be directly added to your current total.
• Any Divine Amulets that exceed the maximum will be sent to your Present Box.
• The Present Box can be found on the Home screen via the Presents icon.
• Depending on your network connection, the gacha animation may be skipped or only partially displayed. Even in these cases, the correct characters will be added to your party. Please check the Character List to confirm.
• The outcome of each draw is calculated individually using a randomized algorithm. As such, there is no guarantee that a character with a 1% rate will appear within 100 draws.
• The Daily Deal is a special discounted draw that can be performed once per day. It can only be performed using paid Jewels.
• The availability of draws that can only be performed once per day resets daily at 1:00 p.m. (UTC).

(The number of Divine Amulets received for a duplicate character depends on that character's rarity. For details, see Draw Rates.)

• The chance of any given character appearing from the Premium Gacha differs based on each character's assigned rate.
• Characters who have already joined your party may still appear as Premium Gacha rewards, but it is not possible to possess more than one of a single character.
• Duplicate character rewards will be converted into Divine Amulets.
• Divine Amulets received in this way are not sent to the Present Box; they will be directly added to your current total.
• Any Divine Amulets that exceed the maximum will be sent to your Present Box.
The Present Box can be found on the Home screen via the Presents icon.
• In certain network connection environments, the gacha animation may be skipped or only partially displayed. Even in these cases, the correct characters will be added to your party. Please check the Character List to confirm.
• The outcome of each draw is calculated individually using a randomized algorithm. As such, there is no guarantee that a character with a 1% rate will appear within 100 draws.
• The Daily Deal is a special discounted draw that can be performed once per day. It can only be performed using paid Jewels.
• The availability of draws that can only be performed once per day resets daily at 1:00 p.m. (UTC).

Rewards consist of characters with rarity 1★ or above.When using the "Draw 10" option, the tenth reward is guaranteed to have rarity of 2★ or above.
Characters with rarity 3★ or above have a unique illustration that can be displayed on your home screen.
Any characters who have already joined your party will be automatically converted into Divine Amulets.
Note: Divine Amulets received in this way are not sent to the Present Box; they will be directly added to your current total.
Note: Any Divine Amulets that exceed the maximum will be sent to your Present Box.
The Present Box can be found on the Home screen via the Presents icon.
(The number of Divine Amulets received for a duplicate character depends on that character's rarity. For details, see Draw Rates.)

[Availability Period]
{{gacha_period}}

About This Gacha

Before drawing from a Prize Gacha, you must choose a character's Memory Shards from the Prize button on the gacha page.
You can change this selection at any time.
The chosen Memory Shards will become available among the Prize Rewards obtained when drawing from the gacha.
This gacha can be drawn by consuming Premium Jewels, free Jewels or applicable tickets.
Rewards consist of characters with rarity 1★ or above. When using the "Draw 10" option, the tenth reward is guaranteed to have rarity of 2★ or above.
Characters with rarity 3★ or above have a unique illustration that can be displayed on your home screen.
Any characters who have already joined your party will be automatically converted into Divine Amulets.
Note: Divine Amulets received in this way are not sent to the Present Box; they will be directly added to your current total.
Note: Any Divine Amulets that exceed the maximum will be sent to your Present Box.
(The number of Divine Amulets received for a duplicate character depends on that character's rarity. For details, see Draw Rates.)
When using the "Draw 1" option, you will receive one character and one Prize Reward.
Each prize reward can vary from 1st Prize to 6th Prize.
When using the "Draw 10" option, you will receive 10 characters and 10 Prize Rewards.
The tenth reward when using "Draw 10" is guaranteed to be a 5th Prize or higher.
Note: Received Prize Rewards are not sent to the Present Box; they will be directly added to your current totals.
Note: Any items received from Prize Rewards that exceed the maximum will be sent to your Present Box.
Important: Characters who are only availabile for a limited time cannot be unlocked using Memory Shards. To unlock one of these characters, you will need to draw them from the gacha.

When using the "Draw 1" option, you will receive one character and one Prize Reward.

When using the "Draw 10" option, you will receive 10 characters and 10 Prize Rewards.
The tenth reward when using "Draw 10" is guaranteed to be a 5th Prize or higher.
Note: Received Prize Rewards are not sent to the Present Box; they will be directly added to your current totals.
Note: Any items received from Prize Rewards that exceed the maximum will be sent to your Present Box.

• Karyl (New Year)

• Karyl (New Year)'s Memory Shard × 100

Additionally, if you obtain Character Exchange Points during this Princess Gala Gacha's period and have not consumed them by Tuesday, December 6, 2022, 10:59 p.m. (UTC), these points will carry over as an equal number of points for use with the next gacha beginning Tuesday, December 6, 2022, 11:00 p.m. (UTC).
Example: If you earned a total of 150 Character Exchange Points by drawing from the Princess Gala Gacha between Dec 3, 2022, 11:00 p.m. and Dec 6, 2022, 10:59 p.m. (UTC), you will have 150 Character Exchange Points for use with the new gacha when it begins at Dec 6, 2022, 11:00 p.m. (UTC).
Note: Character Exchange Points that have been carried over cannot be retained after the end of the gacha beginning on Dec 6, 2022, 11:00 p.m. (UTC).
Note: Character Exchange Points that are carried over will not be converted into skip tickets.
Note: Only Character Exchange Points from the Princess Gala Gacha beginning on Dec 3, 2022, 11:00 p.m. (UTC) can be carried over.
Note: Gacha availability periods are subject to change without notice.

gacha_info.gacha_detail:
The Special Gala Gacha is a gacha for new players that is available for 72 hours after starting the game.
In the Special Gala Gacha, the rate for 3★ characters is boosted from 2.5% to 5%.
The Special Gala Gacha includes the following characters who are available for a limited time, and appear at boosted rates!

[Focus Characters]
• Neneka
• Christina
• Muimi

72 hours starting from the date and time when you first cleared Main Quest 1-2 (NORMAL) after creating your account.

About This Gacha

This gacha can be drawn by consuming Premium Jewels, free Jewels or applicable tickets.
Rewards consist of characters with rarity 1★ or above. When using the "Draw 10" option, the tenth reward is guaranteed to have rarity of 2★ or above.
Characters with rarity 3★ or above have a unique illustration that can be displayed on your home screen.
Any characters who have already joined your party will be automatically converted into Divine Amulets.
Note: Divine Amulets received in this way are not sent to the Present Box; they will be directly added to your current total.
Note: Any Divine Amulets that exceed the maximum will be sent to your Present Box.
The Present Box can be found on the Home screen via the Presents icon.
(The number of Divine Amulets received for a duplicate character depends on that character's rarity. For details, see Draw Rates.)

gacha_info.gacha_detail:
The Limited 3★ Gacha is available for a limited time!
The Limited 3★ Gacha is a 10-draw gacha with a guaranteed limited 3★ character as the tenth reward!
The Limited 3★ Gacha can be drawn only once during its availability period by consuming Premium Jewels.
Note: The only limited 3★ character that may appear from the first to ninth rewards of the Limited 3★ Gacha is Karyl (New Year).
Christina, Neneka, Muimi, Emilia and Rem are not included in the 3★ limited characters that may appear from the Limited 3★ Gacha.
Please note that limited characters other than Karyl (New Year) will not appear under the Locked Characters section of the character list.

For details of available characters, see the Draw Rates tab.
[Availability Period]
{{gacha_period}}

In addition, if you obtain certain characters from an applicable gacha, such as this Limited 3★ Gacha or the Princess Gala Gacha, during their availability periods, you will receive a set of their Memory Shards as a bonus!
This bonus can be obtained repeatedly, each time you obtain the character during the applicable period.
You will also receive the bonus when obtaining the character using Character Exchange Points.
Note: Memory Shards received in this way are not sent to the Present Box; they will be directly added to your current total.
Note: You will not receive the bonus if you obtain the character from a source other than an applicable gacha such as the Princess Gala Gacha or Limited 3★ Gacha.
[Applicable Characters for Bonus]
• Karyl (New Year)

[Bonus Contents]
• Karyl (New Year)'s Memory Shard × 100
